title: "Startup Hair Forever raises $150K in pre-Seed round"
excerpt: "Ex-Hair Original co-founder Ashish Tiwari, after the split with Jitendra Sharma from Hair Originals, has launched a new venture in the Hair extensions domain - Hair Forever. Hair Forever has raised funds worth $150K from an array of angel investors in a pre-Seed round."
